Dear Elmehdi and Aurelien,

 

It has been agreed that CGA will support Shiseido Saudi with a property all-risk insurance policy for our inventory, with Shiseido covering the cost. However, despite operating for a year now, we have not yet received the necessary support from the CGA team regarding this matter.

 

Could you kindly assist us in resolving this issue?

 

@SHAHRUKH Muhammad <mailto:muhammad.shahrukh@emea.shiseido.com> , please advise on whom we are following up for the insurance process.

 

Thank you for your support.

 

Best regards,

Anas

It has been agreed that CGA will support Shiseido Saudi with a property all-risk insurance policy for our inventory, with Shiseido covering the cost. However, despite operating for a year now, we have not yet received the necessary support from the CGA team regarding this matter.

@SHAHRUKH Muhammad <mailto:muhammad.shahrukh@emea.shiseido.com> , please advise on whom we are following up for the insurance process.

 

Thank you for your support.

 

Best regards,

Anas
